NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Instagram and Advertising or the cell corresponding to Blogs and Creator Economy?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Blogs} and {Creator Economy} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Instagram and Creator Economy or the cell corresponding to Spotify and Creator Economy?

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to TikTok and Monetization or the cell corresponding to Podcasts and Revenue?

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to YouTube and Growth or the cell corresponding to Blogs and Platform Trends?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Blogs} and {Platform Trends} has a higher heat value.
